title: MODERN APARTMENT 4BEDROOM 2BATHROOM 2406SQFT
posting_body: An updated open-concept floor plan and tall vaulted ceilings greet you at this lovely 4 bed, 2 bath Round Rock gem.
The bright and airy interior also boasts several windows for great natural light.
The kitchen has it all, from updated appliances to granite countertops.
Plus, there’s a dishwasher to help clean up after an evening with friends.
The primary suite is on the main floor, with three additional bedrooms, a family room, and a bonus room upstairs.
The peaceful covered patio overlooks a greenbelt and park, and the backyard gives you even more relaxing and entertaining options.
Other perks an in-unit washer/dryer, A/C, and parking.
Round Rock’s highly-desirable Sienna community also offers a pool, playground, sports court, and walking trails.
This location is seven miles from downtown Round Rock and 25.5 miles from Austin.
Access to I-35 is close to home, as are 130 and 79.
Several shopping destinations are within a few miles, including Palm Valley Plaza, Mesa Ridge Center, and Stone Hill Town Center.
H-E-B, Walmart, and Randalls are also only a short drive from home when you need to stock the fridge.
Plus, Truboba Cafe, The Kenney Fort British Pub, Humble Pie Desserts, and Baked n’ Sconed are some of the great dining options within a few miles.
